basics.name: Edwin Hurtado
basics.label: Math student
basics.summary: Mathematics student at Yachay Tech University in Ecuador, with a focus on algebra, topology, and computational methods.

work.name: AMARUN
work.summary: Experience in the creation of study guides for Integral Calculus students, focused on integration techniques and the comprehension of these topics at beginner levels within the framework of the Amarum Project. Amarum is an Ecuadorian-French organization dedicated to promoting high-quality mathematics education in Spanish in Ecuador.
highlights: Creation of study guides for Integral Calculus students
Focused on integration techniques and the comprehension of these topics at beginner levels

work.name: Teaching Assistant
work.summary: Guided students in core Python programming concepts and problem-solving techniques. Assisted with labs, graded assignments, and provided feedback to improve coding skills. Supported students in debugging and optimizing code, while promoting logical thinking. Collaborated with the instructor to track progress and ensure course objectives were met.

work.name: Founder Member of Math2Braille Project
work.summary: Founder and contributor to Math2Braille, a project aimed at helping visually impaired individuals learn high-quality mathematics. Responsible for integrating the Nemeth Braille system and new tools into the Tomath program.
highlights: Integration of the Nemeth Braille system
Development of new tools for the Tomath program

work.name: Founder Member of Signify Project
work.summary: Founder and contributor to Signify, a project aimed at helping individuals learn American Sign Language. Responsible for integrating the lessons and quizz system and new tools into the mobile app.
highlights: Integration of the lessons and quizz system
Development of new tools for the mobile app

work.name: Private Tutor
work.summary: Assisting students from various majors at Yachay Tech University in solving problems in subjects such as Linear Algebra, Programming in Python, Topology, and Group & Ring Theory.

volunteer.summary: Main member at Connect-YT project aimed to develop a software to translate pdf documents to braille. Responsible of the high-precise translations and accurary of the program.
highlights: Development of a software to translate pdf documents to braille
High-precise translations and accurary of the program
